content: off in knit very loosely using a needle 2 to 3 sizes larger gently hand wash in warm water using shampoo or very mild soap rinse and remove excess water a cylindrical bolster pillow is handy for blocking or pin on a flat surface to size desired and air dry enjoy these fine qiviut yarns are available at www carylldesigns com you may use and distribute this pattern as long as the copyright and author info remains intact ________________________________________________________________________________ © 2006 caryll a mcconnell / caryll designs 2
